channel.title: Delta source problem
channel.description:
Can someone help me with my delta source server? Nobody can log on my server.
The error I get in my command prompt when someone tries to log in is this : ClientHandler. Client null disconnected
Can someone PLEASE help me fix this !? I've been looking for a solution for a few days now everywhere, and I can't find one!! I worked so hard on this server and its perfect!! I just need to fix this problem so people can join!!
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE x100 help me! :)

item.title: Delta source problem

item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Zero clean your inbox lol I can’t pm you lol

Read full topic

item.title: Delta source problem

@zeroscape12 wrote:

Bump…

Can someone please help me!!

Read full topic

item.title: Delta source problem
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

i answered this for you before, posting another topic isn’t going to fix the error or make me or anyone else give you a different suggestion:

use different objects for networking and gameplay, you are creating the player object before the player has even logged in

when i used delta that fixed the problem for me, although people could still login, it would just be annoying because they had to attempt to log in 3/4 times before it would work

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Try a different client maybe.

Read full topic
